strings.RRP_ITEM_DOUBLESWORD_DESC:
On taking damage, <style=cIsDamage>bleed</style> everything around <style=cIsDamage>{0}m</style> of you for <style=cIsDamage>{2}s</style> for <style=cIsDamage>{1}% base damage</style> <style=cStack>(+{1}% base damage per stack)</style>.
Damage is <style=cIsDamage>{3}x</style> effective on you.
